original_text: And if a wicked person stops doing wicked things and he does things that are right, he will continue to live.
korean_text: 만일 악인이 그 행한 악을 떠나 정의와 공의를 행하면 그 영혼을 보전하리라

sentences.original_text: And if a wicked person stops doing wicked things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 악인이 악한 행동을 멈추면

sentences.original_text: and he does things that are right
